Method#

class hylleraas.method.MethodLike#

Bases: ABC

Base class for method-like computable objects on the Hylleraas Software Platform.

abstract property version: str#

Set the version.

class hylleraas.method.Method(method_input=None, molecule=None, program=None, interface=None, compute_settings=None, **kwargs)#

Bases: MethodLike

Hylleraas Method class.

bind_interface(interface: Callable, compute_settings: ComputeSettings) → None#

Bind interface methods to current class instance.

generic_restart(*args) → None#

Perform generic restart.

get_method_constructor(input: Any) → Callable#

Select correct method constructor by analysing input.

Parameters#

inputAny

method input (str, list, dict, or class instance)

Returns#

Callable

method that constructs a Hylleraas method from input

Note#

We tried to balance user-friendliness with SOLID programming. Therefore, most of the parsing is condensed in this routine.

restart(input: Any) → None#

Perform restart. If there is not interface, performs generic restart.

Parameters#

inputAny

input, e.g. output of geometry optimization

property version#

Return version.

Routines for reading method informations from various input formats.
